verses.verse: And it shall be, when thou art come in <WH935> <WH8799> unto the land <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee for an inheritance <WH5159>, and possessest <WH3423> <WH8804> it, and dwellest <WH3427> <WH8804> therein;

That thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the first <WH7225> of all the fruit <WH6529> of the earth <WH127>, which thou shalt bring <WH935> <WH8686> of thy land <WH776> that the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee, and shalt put <WH7760> <WH8804> it in a basket <WH2935>, and shalt go <WH1980> <WH8804> unto the place <WH4725> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> shall choose <WH977> <WH8799> to place <WH7931> <WH8763> his name <WH8034> there.

And thou shalt go <WH935> <WH8804> unto the Kohen <WH3548> that shall be in those days <WH3117>, and say <WH559> <WH8804> unto him, I profess <WH5046> <WH8689> this day <WH3117> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, that I am come <WH935> <WH8804> unto the country <WH776> which the YY <WH3068> sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto our fathers <WH1> for to give <WH5414> <WH8800> us.

And the Kohen <WH3548> shall take <WH3947> <WH8804> the basket <WH2935> out of thine hand <WH3027>, and set it down <WH3240> <WH8689> before <WH6440> the altar <WH4196> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>.

And thou shalt speak <WH6030> <WH8804> and say <WH559> <WH8804> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, A Syrian <WH761> ready to perish <WH6> <WH8802> was my father <WH1>, and he went down <WH3381> <WH8799> into Egypt <WH4714>, and sojourned <WH1481> <WH8799> there with <WH4962> a few <WH4592>, and became there a nation <WH1471>, great <WH1419>, mighty <WH6099>, and populous <WH7227>:
And the Egyptians <WH4713> evil entreated <WH7489> <WH8686> us, and afflicted <WH6031> <WH8762> us, and laid <WH5414> <WH8799> upon us hard <WH7186> bondage <WH5656>:

And when we cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of our fathers <WH1>, the YY <WH3068> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> our voice <WH6963>, and looked <WH7200> <WH8799> on our affliction <WH6040>, and our labour <WH5999>, and our oppression <WH3906>:

And the YY <WH3068> brought us forth <WH3318> <WH8686> out of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and with an outstretched <WH5186> <WH8803> arm <WH2220>, and with great <WH1419> terribleness <WH4172>, and with signs <WH226>, and with wonders <WH4159>:

And he hath brought <WH935> <WH8686> us into this place <WH4725>, and hath given <WH5414> <WH8799> us this land <WH776>, even a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

And now, behold, I have brought <WH935> <WH8689> the firstfruits <WH6529> <WH7225> of the land <WH127>, which thou, O YY <WH3068>, hast given <WH5414> <WH8804> me. And thou shalt set <WH3240> <WH8689> it before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and worship <WH7812> <WH8694> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>:

And thou shalt rejoice <WH8055> <WH8804> in every good <WH2896> thing which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> unto thee, and unto thine house <WH1004>, thou, and the Levi <WH3881>, and the stranger <WH1616> that is among <WH7130> you.

When thou hast made an end <WH3615> <WH8762> of tithing <WH6237> <WH8687> all the tithes <WH4643> of thine increase <WH8393> the third <WH7992> year <WH8141>, which is the year <WH8141> of tithing <WH4643>, and hast given <WH5414> <WH8804> it unto the Levi <WH3881>, the stranger <WH1616>, the fatherless <WH3490>, and the widow <WH490>, that they may eat <WH398> <WH8804> within thy gates <WH8179>, and be filled <WH7646> <WH8804>;

Then thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, I have brought away <WH1197> <WH8765> the hallowed things <WH6944> out of mine house <WH1004>, and also have given <WH5414> <WH8804> them unto the Levi <WH3881>, and unto the stranger <WH1616>, to the fatherless <WH3490>, and to the widow <WH490>, according to all thy Mitzvot <WH4687> which thou hast commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> me: I have not transgressed <WH5674> <WH8804> thy Mitzvot <WH4687>, neither have I forgotten <WH7911> <WH8804> them:

I have not eaten <WH398> <WH8804> thereof in my mourning <WH205>, neither have I taken away <WH1197> <WH8765> ought thereof for any unclean <WH2931> use, nor given <WH5414> <WH8804> ought thereof for the dead <WH4191> <WH8801>: but I have hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> to the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, and have done <WH6213> <WH8804> according to all that thou hast commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> me.

Look down <WH8259> <WH8685> from thy holy <WH6944> habitation <WH4583>, from heaven <WH8064>, and bless <WH1288> <WH8761> thy people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and the land <WH127> which thou hast given <WH5414> <WH8804> us, as thou swarest <WH7650> <WH8738> unto our fathers <WH1>, a land <WH776> that floweth <WH2100> <WH8802> with milk <WH2461> and honey <WH1706>.

This day <WH3117> the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> hath commanded <WH6680> <WH8764> thee to do <WH6213> <WH8800> these statutes <WH2706> and judgments <WH4941>: thou shalt therefore keep <WH8104> <WH8804> and do <WH6213> <WH8804> them with all thine heart <WH3824>, and with all thy soul <WH5315>.

Thou hast avouched <WH559> <WH8689> the YY <WH3068> this day <WH3117> to be thy 'Elohim <WH430>, and to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in his ways <WH1870>, and to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> his statutes <WH2706>, and his Mitzvot <WH4687>, and his judgments <WH4941>, and to hearken <WH8085> <WH8800> unto his voice <WH6963>:

And the YY <WH3068> hath avouched <WH559> <WH8689> thee this day <WH3117> to be his peculiar <WH5459> people <WH5971>, as he hath promised <WH1696> <WH8765> thee, and that thou shouldest keep <WH8104> <WH8800> all his Mitzvot <WH4687>;

And to make <WH5414> <WH8800> thee high <WH5945> above all nations <WH1471> which he hath made <WH6213> <WH8804>, in praise <WH8416>, and in name <WH8034>, and in honour <WH8597>; and that thou mayest be an holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> unto the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, as he hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765>.
